about_the_game:
Heroic Characters 15


This token pack contains 36 tokens. This pack contains a variety of characters that can be used as PC’s or NPC’s.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Female Deep Gnome Wizard
  • Female Demon Kin fighter
  • Female Drow Matron
  • Female Elf Sorceress
  • Female Gnome Wizard
  • Female Half-Elf Rogue
  • Female Halfling Rogue
  • 2 Female Half-Orc Fighters
  • Female Half-Orc Heavy Fighter
  • Female Human Sorceress
  • Female Tiefling Young Sorceress
  • Male Angelic Reaper
  • Male Black Knight
  • Male Brooding Sorcerer
  • 3 Male Dark Knights
  • Male Demon Kin Fighter
  • 2 Male Dragon Kin Fighters
  • Male Dwarf Fighter
  • Male Dwarven Bard
  • Male Dwarven Dual Weapons
  • Male Dwarven Hammer Cannon
  • Male Elf Battle Mage
  • 2 Male Elf Jungle Hunters
  • Male Elf Ranger
  • Male Elf Wizard
  • Male Gnome Cleric
  • Male Half-Orc Warrior
  • Male Half-Elf Ranger
  • Male Halfling Ranger
  • Male Kobold Fighter Magic User
  • Male Tiefling Sorcerer

Released on March 29, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
